reviewText: Very good.  Shows the real story not just what Al Gore wants you to believe.  it actually involves some science. Not just opinions or scare mongering.  only gave it four stars cause i haven't made it through the whole trilogy yet.

EVERYONE SEEING GORE'S CRAP VIDEO SHOULD TAKE THE CHANCE TO CHALLENGE GORES LIES WITH THIS GLBAL WARLING SWINDLE! THIS IS REAL SCIENCE! NOT HOLLYWOOD FANTASIES!!!!
A MUST FOR EVERY SERIOUS THINKER!
